{{actions:

  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text

- display: Simulate Action

  showresponse: True
  input:

    value: $$repo
  - name: role
    label: Role
    type: text
  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text
  - name: action
    label: Action
    type: text
  - name: force
    label: Force
    type: dropdown
    values:
        - name: force
          label: True
          value: True
        - name: force
          label: False
          value: False
- display: Run
  action: /restmachine/system/atyourservice/install
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo
}}
